notes_text: Possession of up to 10 g decriminalized in 2013, but policy was repealed by President Daniel Noboa in 2023.
notes: Possession of up to 10 g decriminalized in 2013, but policy was repealed by President Daniel Noboa in 2023.
notes_raw: {{main|Cannabis in Ecuador}} Possession of up to {{cvt|10|g|frac=8}} decriminalized in 2013, but policy was repealed by President [[Daniel Noboa]] in 2023.<ref>{{cite news |title=Ecuador's newly sworn-in president repeals guidelines allowing people to carry limited drug amounts |url=https://apnews.com/article/ecuador-president-noboa-drug-trafficking-repeal-6c2e7b2764516113639817716f208300 |access-date=22 March 2024 |work=Associated Press |date=25 November 2023}}</ref>
